name: Brewblossom Aphid
desc:
Remarkable aphids that have formed a symbiotic relationship with the Brewblossoms, helping to tend to the flowers while feeding off their nectar.
You can press Summon to issue a command and call them to your side.

imgDesc.text:
Remarkable aphids that have formed a symbiotic relationship with the Brewblossoms, helping to tend to the flowers while feeding off their nectar.
You can
press Summon to issue a command and call them to your side.

Once you've summoned the aphids to your side, you can
hold the Command skill and enter aiming mode, allowing you to order the aphids to move in specific directions to collect nutrients.
When brewing Aphimead, you can rely on the aphids to
deliver collected nutrients to the brewing equipment. In addition, you can direct aphids to collect nutrients and then use them to nourish withered Brewblossoms.
